teamProjects.title: BasaFinder
teamProjects.description: A full-stack rental housing solution with role-based dashboards for admin, landlords, and tenants.
coreFeatures: Browse, search, and filter rental listings
Landlords can create, edit, and delete listings
Payment option appears after request approval
Admins manage users and all listings
challenges: Ensuring a seamless user experience across multiple roles (Landlord, Tenant, Admin)
Handling real-time rental request approvals and payment flows
Ensuring secure authentication and data integrity for all users
futurePlans: Add machine learning to recommend listings based on user preferences
Introduce a mobile app for better accessibility
Enhance search filters with AI-based suggestions

teamProjects.title: BikeZone
teamProjects.description: An e-commerce platform for buying and selling bikes with category filtering, secure login, and admin features.
coreFeatures: Admin panel to manage products and users
challenges: Maintaining security and data integrity in a dynamic e-commerce environment
Handling real-time updates for stock and orders
Optimizing the site for speed and mobile responsiveness
futurePlans: Expand product categories and introduce new features like reviews and ratings
Integrate more payment options for global customers
Improve search and filtering capabilities with AI-based suggestions

teamProjects.title: QuickFit
teamProjects.description: A fitness tracking web app that allows users to log workouts, monitor progress, and stay fit.
coreFeatures: Personalized fitness plans and progress tracking
Workout routines and meal plans tailored to individual goals
Community support with forums and challenges
Health and fitness calculators (e.g., BMI, calories burned)
challenges: Creating personalized content for users based on fitness goals
Building an interactive and engaging community platform
Maintaining accurate data tracking and analytics for users
futurePlans: Integrate wearables like fitness trackers to sync workout data
Introduce live streaming for fitness classes
Expand the e-shop with more fitness products and tools

singleProjects.title: Eco Mart
singleProjects.description: Eco Mart is a full-stack e-commerce platform designed for seamless shopping and donation-based campaigns. It supports secure checkout, user authentication, admin management, and real-time product tracking.
coreFeatures: Add to cart and secure checkout
Role-based dashboard for admin and users
challenges: Integrating secure and reliable payment gateways
Maintaining backend and frontend data sync
Ensuring scalable and modular project structure
futurePlans: Add product review and rating system
Integrate multiple vendor support
Enhance PWA support and offline capabilities

coreFeatures: Browse, search, and filter rental listings

challenges: Ensuring a seamless user experience across multiple roles (Landlord, Tenant, Admin)

singleProjects.title: Donation Campaign
singleProjects.description: A platform for managing and promoting donation campaigns. It allows users to view, contribute, and track various causes in need of support.
challenges: Ensuring secure donations
Maintaining real-time updates on contributions
futurePlans: Integration with multiple payment gateways
Improved user interface for donors
